content.xhtml:p: Ensures conveyors start before anything else
Sort solenoid and make sure it's not a peg
Counter for rings, Q full or empty
When nothing is in assembly area, and Q is not empty, ring gets dropped
Combination of sensors to see if both ring and peg are passing
Combination of sensors to see if both ring and peg are passing
Allows piston to be activated for 0.5 seconds, then resets piston
Counts a peg passing beam without ring, gets ready for rejection
